page.shortlink: api objects system filefind object name function
page.description: The .NAME() method returns the Filename of the current file in the list of files referenced by the object pointer.

return.name: Filename
return.description: Returns the filename for the current file.

page.example: dim ptr as P ptr = FILEFIND.first("c:\*.txt") ? ptr.creation_time() = 02/27/2003 10:05:50 65 am ? ptr.name() = "c:\Button.Txt"
